HDG.QB.content: people have tended to represent “oblivion of being” as if Being were an umbrella forgotten by some philosophy professor [Nietzsche, cf. S] > oblivion, concealing of as yet unrevealed essence (Wesen) (verbal—essential unfolding) of X Being, shelters (birgt) untapped treasures, promise (Versprechen) of a find that awaits appropriate seeking (das gemässe Suchen wartet) > to have premonition (vermuten) of this doesn’t require prophetic gifts but only attentiveness (Achtung), practiced for decades, to that announced (bekundet) in metaphysical thinking [Heidegger’s askesis]

HDG.DL.content: each man, each instant, in dialogue w/ forbears, perhaps even more, and more hidden, w/ those who will come after (Nachkommen) [inheritance, promise, future full of ghosts]

HDG.DL.content: [re: method of “Expression and Appearance”] never did more than follow a faint trail (Wegspur) > die Spur (dark, perplexing, lightning-sharp, sudden insight [Einblick] [instant]): almost imperceptible promise (vernehmbares Versprechen) announcing (ankündete) we’d be set free into open (ins Freie) > eluded every effort to say it

HDG.LP.content: in Trakl, “the boy’s blue voice retrieves (zurückholt) something forgotten and fore-tells (vorsagt) it” [cf. youth in Evening Conversations] [p. 178 earliness of long since dead promises “springtime of the soul”]> the boy? Elis, the stranger called to go under (Elis different from Trakl, like Zarathustra different from Nietzsche) > Elis goes down into uralte Frühe, older than decomposing Geschlecht, older because more mindful (sinnender), more mindful because more still, more still because self-stilling > boy Elis shelters/stores gentle two-fold of sex [sexual difference not in discord of duality]

HDG.LP.content: Trakl: “And the unborn tends to its own peace” [cf. the dead bury their dead] > unborn guards (hütet)/watches over (wahrt) the stiller childhood, “for the coming awakening of mankind” > at rest, the early dead (Frühvestorbene) lives [the 2nd kind of “a dead”: the stranger, the departed, the unborn], promises the gentler two-fold of mankind [sexual difference no in discord of duality]

HDG.LP.content: land: open region that promises & guards a dwelling (Wohnen) > Trakl’s land is older, more promising than Platonic-Christian land (European West): apartness is “first-beginning” of mounting world-year (steigenden Weltjahres), not abyss of decay
